name: cloud slippers
sizes_available: us women’s small (5-7),women’s medium (8-10), men’s medium (8-10), men’s large (11-13)
notes:
*winner of the 2019 [stik x lion brand pattern contest][1]*

easy beginner pattern makes super soft and fluffy slippers in no time. with just one ball of lion brand wool-ease thick & quick (or equivalent super bulky yarn) you can make any of the four sizes: women’s small (5-7),women’s medium (8-10), men’s medium (8-10), men’s large (11-13).

gauge: 8 sts x 16 rows = 4" in garter stitch (knitting every row).

only knit, purl, cast on, and cast off stitches are used. 

each slipper is made in one piece, folded in half, and seamed from toe to heel.
